titles.title: Let's Get The Praises Rolling In This House

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let's get the praises rolling in this house.
Let's get the praises rolling in this house.
Let's get the praises rolling while the Spirit is moving
Let's get the praises rolling in this house.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let's get a song arising on our lips.
Let's get a song arising on our lips.
Let's get a song arising no more comprising
Let's get a song arising on our lips.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let's get our feet a walking in the way.
Let's get our feet a walking in the way.
Let's get our feet a walking no more just a talking.
Let's get our feet a walking in the way
